rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0001
rows.name: I'm gonna be a Driver when I'm older!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Mum doesn't like the idea. Or Dad.
Or anyone! But I don't care!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A Driver in the army's already been
training me, and I've learned loads
of tips already!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Like, he has Blades with different
types of weapon, from Ether Cannons
to Shield Hammers to Megalances!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And they each have their different
uses, so he needs to change the way
he fights to match each Blade!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Like, when he uses a Shield Hammer,
he tries to get lots of aggro from
enemies to focus their attacks on him.

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Being a Driver's a lot more work than
you'd expect!
